idea: As the farmers & all agri-stakeholders have isolated conversations, the real potential of agriculture has not been fully unleashed. Gramin, which is India’s 1st open & free platform brings inclusivity with the help of technology by strengthening the communication. It reduces the divide between farmers and various integral components of agriculture like research, new technologies, agri-advisors, credit and marketplace. Gramin is a platform which leverages the power of social networking to form a digital community of all agri-stakeholders with farmers at its center.
name: Gramin
